QuestData.Title: It's Just That Easy?
QuestData.Description: <Sal'salabim points to the blueprint.>$B$BYou see where fel cannons are?$B$B<Sal'salabim draws an arrow denoting a change of direction.>$B$BYou turn fel cannon around and use on structures.$B$BWait! Don't be mad! One thing you not know. Overseers have key to turn cannons. You need key first! One from each overseer!$B$BNot so easy, eh?$B$BTake information back to Altruis.
QuestData.LogDescription: Sal'salabim at Shattrath City wants you to return to Altruis the Sufferer in western Nagrand.
QuestData.RewardText: Of course! We will use their own weapons against them!
